src:
Giveaway : iPhone 11 and iMyFone Fixppo license - Gizchina.com
01 Nov 2019, 18:52 by Ying Hua
Giveaway : iPhone 11 and iMyFone Fixppo license2.5 (50%) 2 votes
To thank everyone for their support and celebrate Halloween, renowned iOS software company iMyFone will give away a brand-new iPhone 11 (64GB, random color) and 20 iMyFone Fixppo licenses (worth $54.95) for free.
From now to November 7th, 2019 , everyone is able to win the prize by clicking the event page.


How 


to 


enter the giveaway?



Go to iMyFone Halloween giveaway pageand use the buttons on the page to share the link on your Facebook, Twitter or Reddit.
After sharingthe product along with the hashtags (#iPhone11 and #iMyFoneFixppo), you need to enter your name and email address to submit your application.

Note: Make sure that your post remains public.
The result will be displayed on iMyFone official website, Facebook and Twitter.





Introduction 


of


 iMyFone Fixppo


iMyFone Fixppo is an excellent tool that allows you to repair your iPhone and get your phone back to normal. Not only does it support all versions of iOS, but it also supports a variety of Apple devices, such as the iPad, iPod touch, and Apple TV. Some issues that this program can solve are:

iPhone stuck in recovery mode
Apple TV issues
iPhone stuck on Apple logo
Update failure
iPhone showing white/blackscreen of death

The clear interface and simple operation steps have helped millions of iOS users worldwide. If you want to try it, you can attend the giveaway to win the opportunity!  Good luck to you!
